review: It works great for YouTube and videos from other compatible websites, but for any video that's being streamed from a different website that's not specifically supported by Google (Power Nation TV for example) it's not very good at all. You can set it to send the whole image in the 'tab' to your TV, but the quality of the video won't be very good. The resolution is OK, but it's really jerky and doesn't play smoothly at all. If you watch a lot of YouTube, Netflix, Hulu or any of the other sites that are specifically mentioned in the literature it's definitely worth the $35, but don't expect to be able to stream any video to your TV with good quality results.
